df-mdeg
blocks.content: Define the degree of a polynomial. Note (SO): as an experiment I am using a definition which makes the degree of the zero polynomial ` -oo ` , contrary to the convention used in ~ df-dgr . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 25-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mdeg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cmdg, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmpl, cv(s1))), csup(crn(cmpt(s3, co(cv(s2), csupp, cfv(c0g, cv(s1))), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s3)))), cxr, clt))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mdeg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ mDeg =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(Base `(s0[mPoly]s1))‚Ü¶ sup(ran((s3 ‚àà(s2[supp](0 ` s1))‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s3))), ‚Ñù*, <)))
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: tdeglem1
blocks.content: Functionality of the total degree helper function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tdeglem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c3, cn0))
  -| wceq(c3, crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, c3, co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  fmptd(s1, c2, c3, cn0, co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s1)), wcel(c0, c1))
  gsumsubmcl(ccnfld, cv(s1), cn0, nat0, c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  cnfld0()
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(ccnfld, ccmn), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cnring()
  ringcmn(ccnfld)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cn0, cfv(csubmnd, ccnfld)))
  nn0subm()
  psrbagf(s0, c0, c1, cv(s1), c3)
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, nat0))
  psrbagfsupp(s0, cv(s1), c3, c0, c1)
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tdeglem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 : c3 ‚Üí ‚Ñï0))
  ‚ä£ c3 = { s0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c0)|(`' s0 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin }
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  fmptd(s1, c2, c3, cn0, (CCfld[gsum]s1), c0 ‚àà c1)
  gsumsubmcl(ccnfld, s1, cn0, nat0, c0, c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))
  cnfld0()
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3), CCfld ‚àà CMnd, CCfld ‚àà Ring)
  cnring()
  ringcmn(ccnfld)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c3)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3), ‚Ñï0 ‚àà(SubMnd ` CCfld))
  nn0subm()
  psrbagf(s0, c0, c1, s1, c3)
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c3, s1[finSupp]0)
  psrbagfsupp(s0, s1, c3, c0, c1)
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: tdeglem3
blocks.content: Additivity of the total degree helper function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tdeglem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(cfv(c5, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4)), co(cfv(c5, c2), caddc, cfv(c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(c3, crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpt(s1, c3, co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(cfv(c5, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4)), co(cfv(c5, c2), caddc, cfv(c5, c4)))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(cfv(c5, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4)), co(cfv(c5, c2), caddc, cfv(c5, c4)))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(cfv(c5, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4)), co(cfv(c5, c2), caddc, cfv(c5, c4)))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(c5, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4)), co(cfv(c5, c2), caddc, cfv(c5, c4)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4)), co(co(ccnfld, cgsu, c2), caddc, co(ccnfld, cgsu, c4)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)))
  gsumadd(ccnfld, c2, caddc, c4, cc, nat0, c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)))
  cnfldbas()
  cnfld0()
  cnfldadd()
  mp1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wcel(ccnfld, ccmn), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cnring()
  ringcmn(ccnfld)
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wf(c2, c0, cc))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c2, c0, cc), wf(c2, c0, cn0), wss(cn0, cc))
  psrbagf(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  fss(c2, c0, cn0, cc)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wf(c4, c0, cc))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, c3)), wf(c4, c0, cc), wf(c4, c0, cn0), wss(cn0, cc))
  psrbagf(s0, c0, c1, c4, c3)
  nn0sscn()
  fss(c4, c0, cn0, cc)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wbr(c2, cfsupp, nat0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c2, cfsupp, nat0))
  psrbagfsupp(s0, c2, c3, c0, c1)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wbr(c4, cfsupp, nat0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, c3), wbr(c4, cfsupp, nat0))
  psrbagfsupp(s0, c4, c3, c0, c1)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(cfv(c5, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4))), wcel(co(c2, cof(caddc), c4), c3))
  psrbagaddcl(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  fvmpt(s1, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4), c3, c5, co(ccnfld, cgsu, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s1)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), co(c2, cof(caddc), c4), ccnfld, cgsu)
  ovex(ccnfld, cgsu, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wceq(co(cfv(c5, c2), caddc, cfv(c5, c4)), co(co(ccnfld, cgsu, c2), caddc, co(ccnfld, cgsu, c4))))
  oveqan12d(cfv(c5, c2), caddc, cfv(c5, c4), co(ccnfld, cgsu, c2), co(ccnfld, cgsu, c4), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))
  fvmpt(s1, c2, c3, c5, co(ccnfld, cgsu, c2), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s1)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, ccnfld, cgsu)
  ovex(ccnfld, cgsu, c2)
  fvmpt(s1, c4, c3, c5, co(ccnfld, cgsu, c4), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s1)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c4, ccnfld, cgsu)
  ovex(ccnfld, cgsu, c4)
  diff.co.s(s1, ccnfld, cgsu, co(c2, cof(caddc), c4))
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, cof(caddc), c4)
  diff.cof.s(s1, caddc)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, ccnfld, cgsu, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, ccnfld, cgsu, c4)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s1)
  diff.cgsu.s(s1)
}

thm tdeglem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c5 `(c2[oF(+)]c4))=((c5 ` c2)[+](c5 ` c4)))
  ‚ä£ c3 = { s0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c0)|(`' s0 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin }
  ‚ä£ c5 =(s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c5 `(c2[oF(+)]c4))=((c5 ` c2)[+](c5 ` c4))), d(s0, s1))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c5 `(c2[oF(+)]c4))=((c5 ` c2)[+](c5 ` c4))), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c5 `(c2[oF(+)]c4))=((c5 ` c2)[+](c5 ` c4))), d(s1, c1))
  3eqtr4d((c5 `(c2[oF(+)]c4)), ((c5 ` c2)[+](c5 ` c4)), (CCfld[gsum](c2[oF(+)]c4)), ((CCfld[gsum]c2)[+](CCfld[gsum]c4)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3))
  gsumadd(ccnfld, c2, caddc, c4, cc, nat0, c0, c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3))
  cnfldbas()
  cnfld0()
  cnfldadd()
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3), CCfld ‚àà CMnd, CCfld ‚àà Ring)
  cnring()
  ringcmn(ccnfld)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3)
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3, (c2 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))
  sylancl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c2 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), (c2 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñï0), ‚Ñï0 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  psrbagf(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  fss(c2, c0, cn0, cc)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3, (c4 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))
  sylancl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñï0), ‚Ñï0 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  psrbagf(s0, c0, c1, c4, c3)
  nn0sscn()
  fss(c4, c0, cn0, cc)
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3, c2[finSupp]0)
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c2[finSupp]0)
  psrbagfsupp(s0, c2, c3, c0, c1)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3, c4[finSupp]0)
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà c3, c4[finSupp]0)
  psrbagfsupp(s0, c4, c3, c0, c1)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3), (c5 `(c2[oF(+)]c4))=(CCfld[gsum](c2[oF(+)]c4)), (c2[oF(+)]c4)‚àà c3)
  psrbagaddcl(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  fvmpt(s1, (c2[oF(+)]c4), c3, c5, (CCfld[gsum](c2[oF(+)]c4)), (CCfld[gsum]s1))
  oveq2(s1, (c2[oF(+)]c4), ccnfld, cgsu)
  ovex(ccnfld, cgsu, (c2[oF(+)]c4))
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3, ((c5 ` c2)[+](c5 ` c4))=((CCfld[gsum]c2)[+](CCfld[gsum]c4)))
  oveqan12d((c5 ` c2), caddc, (c5 ` c4), (CCfld[gsum]c2), (CCfld[gsum]c4), c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c3)
  fvmpt(s1, c2, c3, c5, (CCfld[gsum]c2), (CCfld[gsum]s1))
  oveq2(s1, c2, ccnfld, cgsu)
  ovex(ccnfld, cgsu, c2)
  fvmpt(s1, c4, c3, c5, (CCfld[gsum]c4), (CCfld[gsum]s1))
  oveq2(s1, c4, ccnfld, cgsu)
  ovex(ccnfld, cgsu, c4)
  diff.co.s(s1, ccnfld, cgsu, (c2[oF(+)]c4))
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, oF(+), c4)
  diff.cof.s(s1, caddc)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, ccnfld, cgsu, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, ccnfld, cgsu, c4)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s1)
  diff.cgsu.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: tdeglem4
blocks.content: There is only one multi-index with total degree 0. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tdeglem4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c2), nat0), wceq(c2, cxp(c0, csn(nat0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s1, c3, co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c2), nat0), wceq(c2, cxp(c0, csn(nat0))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c2), nat0), wceq(c2, cxp(c0, csn(nat0))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), nat0), wceq(c2, cxp(c0, csn(nat0))))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), nat0), wceq(c2, cxp(c0, csn(nat0))), wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  necon4bd(cfv(c4, c2), nat0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  syl5bir(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wne(cfv(c4, c2), nat0), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0))))
  rexnal(hs0, c0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  rexlimdva(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cfv(c4, c2), nat0))
  syl5bir(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cfv(c4, c2), nat0), wne(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  expr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0), wne(cfv(c4, c2), nat0))
  eqnetrd(cfv(c4, c2), nat0, co(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), caddc, co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0))))
  3eqtrd(cfv(c4, c2), co(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), caddc, co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))), co(ccnfld, cgsu, c2), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, c0, cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), co(ccnfld, cgsu, c2)))
  fvmpt(s1, c2, c3, c4, co(ccnfld, cgsu, c2), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s1)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, ccnfld, cgsu)

blocks.content: Simplification of total degree for the univariate case. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)

thm tdeglem2(setvar s0) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(s0), emptycls)), cmpt(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s0))))
} = {
  mpteq2ia(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s0)))
  eqcomd(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))
  eleq2s(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, c1o), co(cn0, cmap, csn(emptycls)), wceq(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  eqtrd(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, csn(emptycls), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, csn(emptycls))))
  oveq2d(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s0), cmpt(hs0, csn(emptycls), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, csn(emptycls))))
  feqmptd(hs0, cv(s0), csn(emptycls), cn0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, csn(emptycls))))
  syl3anc(wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, csn(emptycls))), wceq(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, csn(emptycls), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), cfv(cv(s0), emptycls)), wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(emptycls, universe), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), cc))
  mp1i(wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, csn(emptycls))), wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cnring()
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, csn(emptycls))), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  nn0cnd(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, csn(emptycls))))
  sylancl(wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), cn0), wf(cv(s0), csn(emptycls), cn0), wcel(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))
  elmapi(cv(s0), cn0, csn(emptycls))
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
  ffvelrn(cv(s0), csn(emptycls), cn0, emptycls)
  gsumsn(hs0, ccnfld, emptycls, universe, cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), cc, cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  cnfldbas()
  fveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(s0))
  oveq2i(cn0, cmap, c1o, csn(emptycls))
  df1o2()
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))

  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)

thm mdegfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ sup((c2 "(s0[supp]c3)), ‚Ñù*, <))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c4[mDeg]c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(c4[mPoly]c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c7 = { s1 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c4)|(`' s1 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin }
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s2 ‚àà c7 ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c7)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ sup((c2 "(s0[supp]c3)), ‚Ñù*, <)), (c4[mDeg]c5))
  pm2.61i((c4[mDeg]c5)=(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ sup((c2 "(s0[supp]c3)), ‚Ñù*, <)), (c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà ùïå))

  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c4, universe, c5, universe, cmdg, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ sup(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp]c3)‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), ‚Ñù*, <)), (s0 ‚àà(Base `(hs0[mPoly]hs1))‚Ü¶ sup(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp](0 ` hs1))‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), ‚Ñù*, <)))
  mpteq12dv(s0, (Base `(hs0[mPoly]hs1)), sup(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp](0 ` hs1))‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), ‚Ñù*, <), c1, sup(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp]c3)‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), ‚Ñù*, <), (hs0 = c4 ‚àß hs1 = c5))
  syl6eqr((Base `(hs0[mPoly]hs1)), c1, (Base ` c6), (hs0 = c4 ‚àß hs1 = c5))
  fveq2d(cbs, (hs0[mPoly]hs1), c6, (hs0 = c4 ‚àß hs1 = c5))
  syl6eqr((hs0[mPoly]hs1), c6, (c4[mPoly]c5), (hs0 = c4 ‚àß hs1 = c5))
  oveq12(hs0, c4, hs1, c5, cmpl)
  adantl(hs0 = c4, hs1 = c5, sup(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp](0 ` hs1))‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), ‚Ñù*, <)= sup(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp]c3)‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), ‚Ñù*, <))
  supeq1d(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp](0 ` hs1))‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), cxr, clt, ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp]c3)‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), hs1 = c5)
  rneqd((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp](0 ` hs1))‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2)), (s2 ‚àà(s0[supp]c3)‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2)), hs1 = c5)
  mpteq1d(s2, (s0[supp](0 ` hs1)), (CCfld[gsum]s2), (s0[supp]c3), hs1 = c5)
  oveq2d(s0, csupp, (0 ` hs1), c3, hs1 = c5)
  syl6eqr((0 ` hs1), c3, (0 ` c5), hs1 = c5)
  fveq2(hs1, c5, c0g)
  df-mdeg(hs0, hs1, s0, s2)
  mptex(s0, c1, sup(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp]c3)‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), ‚Ñù*, <))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c6)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c1, sup(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp]c3)‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), ‚Ñù*, <), sup((c2 "(s0[supp]c3)), ‚Ñù*, <), (c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà ùïå))
  supeq1d(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp]c3)‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), cxr, clt, (c2 "(s0[supp]c3)), ((c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
  syl6eqr(ran((s2 ‚àà(s0[supp]c3)‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2))), (c2 "(s0[supp]c3)), ran((c2 |`(s0[supp]c3))), ((c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))

  reseq1i(c2, (s0[supp]c3), (s2 ‚àà c7 ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s2)))
  resmptd(s2, c7, (CCfld[gsum]s2), (s0[supp]c3), ((c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
  fssdm((s0[supp]c3), c7, s0, (Base ` c5), ((c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
  suppssdm(s0, c3)
  mplelf(s1, s0, c7, (Base ` c5), c6, c4, c5, c1, ((c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
  eqid((Base ` c5))

  df-ima(c2, (s0[supp]c3))
  eqtr4d((c4[mDeg]c5), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ sup((c2 "(s0[supp]c3)), ‚Ñù*, <)), (s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ ‚Ü¶ sup((c2 "(s0[supp]c3)), ‚Ñù*, <)), ¬¨(c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà ùïå))

  syl5eq(c6, emptycls, (c4[mPoly]c5), ¬¨(c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà ùïå))

blocks.content: Value of the multivariate degree function at some particular polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 25-Jun-2019.)

thm mdegval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), csup(cima(c3, co(c0, csupp, c4)), cxr, clt)))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c5, cmdg, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, co(c5, cmpl, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c5), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s1, c8, co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, c1, c2, csup(cima(c3, co(c0, csupp, c4)), cxr, clt), csup(cima(c3, co(cv(hs0), csupp, c4)), cxr, clt))
  supeq1d(cima(c3, co(cv(hs0), csupp, c4)), cxr, clt, cima(c3, co(c0, csupp, c4)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

blocks.name: mdeglt
blocks.content: If there is an upper limit on the degree of a polynomial that is lower than the degree of some exponent bag, then that exponent bag is unrepresented in the polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mdeglt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, cmdg, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, co(c4, cmpl, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c8, crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))
  -| wceq(c9, cmpt(s1, c8, co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cfv(c9, c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cfv(c9, c1)))
  rspcdva(hs0, c1, c8, w0, wi(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cfv(c9, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), wi(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cfv(c9, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cfv(c9, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cfv(c9, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  breq2d(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cfv(c9, cv(hs0)), cfv(c9, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c9)
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, c2)
  mpbid(w0, wral(hs0, c8, wi(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cfv(c9, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), cle, cfv(c3, c0)))
  xrleidd(cfv(c3, c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), cle, cfv(c3, c0)), wral(hs0, c8, wi(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cfv(c9, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))), wcel(c0, c7), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cxr))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c3, c0), cxr, csup(cima(c9, co(c0, csupp, c2)), cxr, clt), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c3, c0), csup(cima(c9, co(c0, csupp, c2)), cxr, clt)), wcel(c0, c7))
  mdegval(s0, s1, c0, c7, c3, c9, c2, c4, c5, c6, c8)
  syl(w0, wcel(csup(cima(c9, co(c0, csupp, c2)), cxr, clt), cxr), wss(cima(c9, co(c0, csupp, c2)), cxr))
  syl5ss(cima(c9, co(c0, csupp, c2)), cxr, crn(c9), w0)
  imassrn(c9, co(c0, csupp, c2))
  syl6ss(crn(c9), cxr, cn0, w0)
  4syl(w0, wss(crn(c9), cn0), wcel(c0, c7), wcel(c4, universe), wf(c9, c8, cn0))
  mplrcl(c0, c7, c4, c6, c5)
  tdeglem1(s0, s1, c4, universe, c9, c8)
  frn(c9, c8, cn0)
  sstri(cn0, cxr, cr)
  nn0ssre()
  ressxr()
  supxrcl(cima(c9, co(c0, csupp, c2)))
  mdegleb(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c7, cfv(c3, c0), c3, c8, c9, c2, c4, c5, c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)

thm mdeglt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c4[mDeg]c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(c4[mPoly]c5)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c8 = { s0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c4)|(`' s0 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin }
  ‚ä£ c9 =(s1 ‚àà c8 ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]s1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c8)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c3 ` c0)[<](c9 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c8)
} = {
  mpd(w0, (c0 ` c1)= c2, (c3 ` c0)[<](c9 ` c1))
  rspcdva(hs0, c1, c8, w0, ((c3 ` c0)[<](c9 ` c1)‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2), ((c3 ` c0)[<](c9 ` hs0)‚Üí(c0 ` hs0)= c2))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, (c3 ` c0)[<](c9 ` hs0), (c0 ` hs0)= c2, (c3 ` c0)[<](c9 ` c1), (c0 ` c1)= c2)
  breq2d((c3 ` c0), clt, (c9 ` hs0), (c9 ` c1), hs0 = c1)

  fveqeq2(hs0, c1, c0, c2)
  mpbid(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c8,((c3 ` c0)[<](c9 ` hs0)‚Üí(c0 ` hs0)= c2)), (c3 ` c0)[‚â§](c3 ` c0))

  eqeltrd((c3 ` c0), cxr, sup((c9 "(c0[supp]c2)), ‚Ñù*, <), w0)
  syl(w0, (c3 ` c0)= sup((c9 "(c0[supp]c2)), ‚Ñù*, <), c0 ‚àà c7)
  mdegval(s0, s1, c0, c7, c3, c9, c2, c4, c5, c6, c8)
  syl(w0, sup((c9 "(c0[supp]c2)), ‚Ñù*, <)‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c9 "(c0[supp]c2))‚äÜ ‚Ñù*)
  syl5ss((c9 "(c0[supp]c2)), cxr, ran(c9), w0)
  imassrn(c9, (c0[supp]c2))
  syl6ss(ran(c9), cxr, cn0, w0)

  mplrcl(c0, c7, c4, c6, c5)
  tdeglem1(s0, s1, c4, universe, c9, c8)
  frn(c9, c8, cn0)

  mdegleb(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c7, (c3 ` c0), c3, c8, c9, c2, c4, c5, c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: mdegldg
blocks.content: A nonzero polynomial has some coefficient which witnesses its degree. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mdegldg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wrex(s0, c4, wa(wne(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c5), wceq(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c7, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c7, co(c8, cmdg, c0))
  -| wceq(c9, co(c8, cmpl, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c9))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s1, co(cn0, cmap, c8), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s1)), cn), cfn)))
  -| wceq(c6, cmpt(s2, c4, co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c9))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wrex(s0, c4, wa(wne(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c5), wceq(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c7, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wrex(s0, c4, wa(wne(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c5), wceq(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c7, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c2))

  mdegval(s1, s2, c1, c2, c7, c6, c5, c8, c0, c9, c4)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(csup(cima(c6, co(c1, csupp, c5)), cxr, clt), cima(c6, co(c1, csupp, c5))), wcel(cima(c6, co(c1, csupp, c5)), cfn), wne(cima(c6, co(c1, csupp, c5)), emptycls), wss(cima(c6, co(c1, csupp, c5)), cxr))

thm mdegxrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cxr))

  -| wceq(c5, co(c3, cmpl, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(c2, c0), cxr, csup(cima(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), co(c0, csupp, cfv(c0g, c4))), cxr, clt), wcel(c0, c1))
  mdegval(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0g, c4), c3, c4, c5, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c4))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csup(cima(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), co(c0, csupp, cfv(c0g, c4))), cxr, clt), cxr), wss(cima(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), co(c0, csupp, cfv(c0g, c4))), cxr))
  syl5ss(cima(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), co(c0, csupp, cfv(c0g, c4))), cxr, crn(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, c1))
  imassrn(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), co(c0, csupp, cfv(c0g, c4)))
  syl6ss(crn(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0)))), cxr, cn0, wcel(c0, c1))
  3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wss(crn(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0)))), cn0), wcel(c3, universe), wf(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), cn0))
  mplrcl(c0, c1, c3, c5, c4)
  tdeglem1(hs1, hs0, c3, universe, cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)))
  eqid(crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))))
  frn(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), cn0)
  sstri(cn0, cxr, cr)
  nn0ssre()
  ressxr()
  supxrcl(cima(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), co(c0, csupp, cfv(c0g, c4))))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c4))

  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

  syl5ss(((hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c3)|(`' hs1 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]hs0))"(c0[supp](0 ` c4))), cxr, ran((hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c3)|(`' hs1 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]hs0))), c0 ‚àà c1)

  syl6ss(ran((hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c3)|(`' hs1 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]hs0))), cxr, cn0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  3syl(c0 ‚àà c1, ran((hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c3)|(`' hs1 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]hs0)))‚äÜ ‚Ñï0, c3 ‚àà ùïå, ((hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c3)|(`' hs1 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]hs0)): { hs1 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c3)|(`' hs1 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Üí ‚Ñï0))

blocks.name: mdegxrf
blocks.content: Functionality of polynomial degree in the extended reals. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mdegxrf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wf(c0, c1, cxr)
  -| wceq(c0, co(c2, cmdg, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c2, cmpl, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wf(c0, c1, cxr), wfn(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cxr)))
  fnmpti(hs1, c0, c1, csup(cima(cmpt(hs2, crab(hs3, co(cn0, cmap, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs3)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs2))), co(cv(hs1), csupp, cfv(c0g, c3))), cxr, clt))
  supex(cima(cmpt(hs2, crab(hs3, co(cn0, cmap, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs3)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs2))), co(cv(hs1), csupp, cfv(c0g, c3))), cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  mdegfval(hs1, hs3, hs2, c0, c1, cmpt(hs2, crab(hs3, co(cn0, cmap, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs3)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs2))), cfv(c0g, c3), c2, c3, c4, crab(hs3, co(cn0, cmap, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs3)), cn), cfn)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c3))
  eqid(crab(hs3, co(cn0, cmap, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs3)), cn), cfn)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs2, crab(hs3, co(cn0, cmap, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs3)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs2))))
  rgen(hs0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cxr))
  mdegxrcl(cv(hs0), c1, c0, c2, c3, c4)
  ffnfv(hs0, c0, c1, cxr)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(c0g, c3))
  diff.hs2.c(crab(hs3, co(cn0, cmap, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs3)), cn), cfn)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù*)

  mdegfval(hs1, hs3, hs2, c0, c1, (hs2 ‚àà { hs3 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c2)|(`' hs3 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]hs2)), (0 ` c3), c2, c3, c4, { hs3 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c2)|(`' hs3 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin })
  eqid((0 ` c3))
  eqid({ hs3 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c2)|(`' hs3 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin })
  eqid((hs2 ‚àà { hs3 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c2)|(`' hs3 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]hs2)))
  rgen(hs0, c1, (c0 ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñù*)

}

  syl6ss(cima(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), co(c0, csupp, cfv(c0g, c4))), cun(cn0, csn(cmnf)), cn0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(cima(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs1)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs0))), co(c0, csupp, cfv(c0g, c4))), emptycls)))

blocks.name: degltlem1
blocks.content: Theorem on arithmetic of extended reals useful for degrees. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm degltlem1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cun(cn0, csn(cmnf))), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
} = {
  sylanb(wcel(c0, cun(cn0, csn(cmnf))), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wo(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, csn(cmnf))))
  elun(c0, cn0, csn(cmnf))
  jaoian(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c0, cz))
  nn0z(c0)
  zltlem1(c0, c1)

blocks.name: mdegvscale
blocks.content: The degree of a scalar multiple of a polynomial is at most the degree of the original polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mdegvscale(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), cle, cfv(c0, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c5, cmpl, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c5, cmdg, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crg))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvsca, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c8))
} = {

blocks.name: mdegvsca
blocks.content: The degree of a scalar multiple of a polynomial is exactly the degree of the original polynomial when the multiple is a nonzero-divisor. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: mdegmulle2
blocks.content: The multivariate degree of a product of polynomials is at most the sum of the degrees of the polynomials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mdegmulle2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), cle, co(c4, caddc, c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, co(c7, cmpl, c8))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c7, cmdg, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, crg))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmulr, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c10))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c10))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c3), cle, c5))
} = {
  mdegmullem(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, c9, c10, crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c7), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn)), cmpt(hs1, crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c7), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs1))), w0)
  eqid(crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c7), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c7), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c7), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn)))
  diff.hs1.c(c7)
  diff.hs1.c(c8)
  diff.hs1.c(c9)
}

thm mdegmulle2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 `(c1[c2]c3))[‚â§](c4[+]c5))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(c7[mPoly]c8)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c7[mDeg]c8)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà c9)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c8 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ c10 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(√ó ` c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c10)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c10)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)[‚â§]c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c3)[‚â§]c5)
} = {
  mdegmullem(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, c9, c10, { hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c7)|(`' hs0 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin }, (hs1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c7)|(`' hs0 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]hs1)), w0)
  eqid({ hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c7)|(`' hs0 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin })
  eqid((hs1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]c7)|(`' hs0 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶(CCfld[gsum]hs1)))

blocks.name: deg1fval
blocks.content: Relate univariate polynomial degree to multivariate. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm deg1fval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, co(c1o, cmdg, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cdg1, c1))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, co(c1o, cmdg, c1), cfv(cdg1, c1))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cdg1, c1), co(c1o, cmdg, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, cdg1, co(c1o, cmdg, c1), co(c1o, cmdg, cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c1o, cmdg)
  df-deg1(hs0)
  ovex(c1o, cmdg, c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cdg1, c1), co(c1o, cmdg, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, cdg1)
  ovprc2(c1, c1o, cmdg)
  reldmmdeg()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1o, cmdg, c1))
}

thm deg1fval(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(1o[mDeg]c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(deg1 ` c1)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, (1o[mDeg]c1), (deg1 ` c1))
  pm2.61i((deg1 ` c1)=(1o[mDeg]c1), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, cdg1, (1o[mDeg]c1), (1o[mDeg]hs0))
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c1o, cmdg)
  df-deg1(hs0)
  ovex(c1o, cmdg, c1)
  eqtr4d((deg1 ` c1), (1o[mDeg]c1), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c1, cdg1)
  ovprc2(c1, c1o, cmdg)
  reldmmdeg()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((1o[mDeg]c1))
}

thm mdegpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmdg, c1), co(c0, cmdg, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(co(c0, cmdg, c1), co(c0, cmdg, c2), cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c1)), csup(cima(cmpt(hs1, crab(hs2, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs2)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csupp, cfv(c0g, c1))), cxr, clt)), cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c2)), csup(cima(cmpt(hs1, crab(hs2, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs2)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csupp, cfv(c0g, c2))), cxr, clt)), w0)
  mpteq12dv(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c1)), csup(cima(cmpt(hs1, crab(hs2, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs2)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csupp, cfv(c0g, c1))), cxr, clt), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c2)), csup(cima(cmpt(hs1, crab(hs2, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs2)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csupp, cfv(c0g, c2))), cxr, clt), w0)

  supeq1d(cima(cmpt(hs1, crab(hs2, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs2)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csupp, cfv(c0g, c1))), cxr, clt, cima(cmpt(hs1, crab(hs2, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs2)), cn), cfn)), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), csupp, cfv(c0g, c2))), w0)

  oveq2d(hs0, csupp, (0 ` c1), (0 ` c2), w0)

blocks.origin:
thm deg1propd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cdg1, c0), cfv(cdg1, c1)))

  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cdg1, c0), cfv(cdg1, c1), co(c1o, cmdg, c0), co(c1o, cmdg, c1), w0)

  eqid(cfv(cdg1, c0))
  deg1fval(cfv(cdg1, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cdg1, c1))
}

thm deg1n0ima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  mp2an(wb(wss(cima(c1, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), cn0), wral(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(c3)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cn0))), wfun(c1), wss(cdif(c2, csn(c3)), cdm(c1)))
  ax-mp(wfun(c1), wf(c1, c2, cxr))

thm deg1nn0clb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wne(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cn0)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cdg1, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c5))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wne(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cn0))

  necon2ad(c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cn0))

  mtbiri(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), cn0), wcel(cmnf, cn0))
  mto(wcel(cmnf, cn0), wcel(cmnf, cr))
  neli(cmnf, cr)
  mnfnre()

blocks.name: deg1ldgn
blocks.content: An index at which a polynomial is zero, cannot be its degree. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm deg1ldgn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cdg1, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cco1, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c8, c2), c7))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wne(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c8, c2), c7))
  necon2d(cfv(c8, c2), c7, cfv(c0, c1), c2, w0)
  ex(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wne(cfv(c8, c2), c7))
  eqnetrrd(cfv(c8, c2), c7, cfv(c8, cfv(c0, c1)), wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c8, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c8, c2)))
  fveq2(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c8)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), wne(cfv(c8, cfv(c0, c1)), c7), wcel(c3, crg), wcel(c1, c6), wne(c1, c5))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c3, crg))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, c6))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), wne(c1, c5), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0))
  imp(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0))
  syl(w0, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0)), wcel(c2, cn0))
  eleq1a(c2, cn0, cfv(c0, c1))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wb(wne(c1, c5), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wne(c1, c5), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0)), wcel(c3, crg), wcel(c1, c6))
  deg1nn0clb(c3, c1, c6, c5, c0, c4)
  deg1ldg(c3, c1, c6, c5, c8, c0, c7, c4)
}

thm deg1ldgn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚â† c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(deg1 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Poly1 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(0 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(0 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(coe1 ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c8 ` c2)= c7)
} = {
  mpd(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚â† c2, (c8 ` c2)= c7)
  necon2d((c8 ` c2), c7, (c0 ` c1), c2, w0)
  ex(w0, (c0 ` c1)= c2, (c8 ` c2)‚â† c7)
  eqnetrrd((c8 ` c2), c7, (c8 `(c0 ` c1)), (w0 ‚àß(c0 ` c1)= c2))
  adantl(w0, (c0 ` c1)= c2, (c8 `(c0 ` c1))=(c8 ` c2))
  fveq2((c0 ` c1), c2, c8)
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß(c0 ` c1)= c2), (c8 `(c0 ` c1))‚â† c7, c3 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà c6, c1 ‚â† c5)
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c1)= c2, c3 ‚àà Ring)
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c1)= c2, c1 ‚àà c6)
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß(c0 ` c1)= c2), c1 ‚â† c5, (c0 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  imp(w0, (c0 ` c1)= c2, (c0 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  syl(w0, ((c0 ` c1)= c2 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï0), c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  eleq1a(c2, cn0, (c0 ` c1))
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c1)= c2, (c1 ‚â† c5 ‚Üî(c0 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  syl2anc(w0, (c1 ‚â† c5 ‚Üî(c0 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï0), c3 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà c6)
  deg1nn0clb(c3, c1, c6, c5, c0, c4)
  deg1ldg(c3, c1, c6, c5, c8, c0, c7, c4)
}

blocks.name: deg1ldgdomn
blocks.content: A nonzero univariate polynomial over a domain always has a nonzero-divisor leading coefficient. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm deg1ldgdomn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(cfv(c4, cfv(c5, c1)), c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cdg1, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c7))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(crlreg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cco1, c1))
} = {
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(cfv(c4, cfv(c5, c1)), c6), wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(cfv(c4, cfv(c5, c1)), cfv(cbs, c0)), wne(cfv(c4, cfv(c5, c1)), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3))
  ffvelrnd(c4, cfv(c5, c1), cfv(cbs, c0), cn0, w3a(wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wf(c4, cn0, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  coe1f(c1, c2, c4, cfv(cbs, c0), c7, c0)
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c5, c1), cn0), wcel(c0, crg))
  deg1nn0cl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c7)
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wne(cfv(c4, cfv(c5, c1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wcel(c0, crg))
  domnring(c0)
  deg1ldg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(c0g, c0), c7)
  domnrrg(c0, cfv(c4, cfv(c5, c1)), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c6)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm deg1ldgdomn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Domn ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c3)‚Üí(c4 `(c5 ` c1))‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(deg1 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Poly1 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(RLReg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(coe1 ` c1)
} = {
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà Domn ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c3), (c4 `(c5 ` c1))‚àà c6, c0 ‚àà Domn, (c4 `(c5 ` c1))‚àà(Base ` c0), (c4 `(c5 ` c1))‚â†(0 ` c0))
  simp1(c0 ‚àà Domn, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚â† c3)
  ffvelrnd(c4, (c5 ` c1), (Base ` c0), cn0, (c0 ‚àà Domn ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c3))
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà Domn, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚â† c3, (c4 : ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí(Base ` c0)))
  coe1f(c1, c2, c4, (Base ` c0), c7, c0)
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà Domn, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚â† c3, (c5 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï0, c0 ‚àà Ring)
  deg1nn0cl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c7)
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà Domn, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚â† c3, (c4 `(c5 ` c1))‚â†(0 ` c0), c0 ‚àà Ring)

  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
}

blocks.name: deg1leb
blocks.content: Property of being of limited degree. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm deg1leb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cxr)), wb(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), cle, c2), wral(s0, cn0, wi(wbr(c2, clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdg1, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cpl1, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cco1, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), cle, c2), wral(s0, cn0, wi(wbr(c2, clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5))), wral(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), wi(wbr(c2, clt, cfv(cmpt(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls)), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c5))))
  mdegleb(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cmpt(hs1, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs1), emptycls)), c5, c1o, c6, co(c1o, cmpl, c6))
  deg1fval(c3, c6)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c6))
  ply1bas(c1, c6, c7, cfv(cps1, c6))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c6))
  psr1baslem(hs2)

thm deg1val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), csup(co(c3, csupp, c4), cxr, clt)))

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cpl1, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cco1, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c2, c0), csup(co(c3, csupp, c4), cxr, clt), csup(cima(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), co(c0, csupp, c4)), cxr, clt), wcel(c0, c1))
  mdegval(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), c4, c1o, c5, co(c1o, cmpl, c5), co(cn0, cmap, c1o))
  deg1fval(c2, c5)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c5))
  ply1bas(c1, c5, c6, cfv(cps1, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c5))
  psr1baslem(hs1)
  tdeglem2(hs0)
  supeq1d(cima(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), co(c0, csupp, c4)), cxr, clt, co(c3, csupp, c4), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl6eq(cima(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), co(c0, csupp, c4)), co(c3, csupp, c4), cima(ccnv(c3), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqtrd(cima(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), co(c0, csupp, c4)), cima(ccnv(c3), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), cima(ccom(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), ccnv(c0)), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl6eqr(cima(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), co(c0, csupp, c4)), cima(ccom(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), ccnv(c0)), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), cima(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))), wcel(c0, c1))
  imaeq2d(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), co(c0, csupp, c4), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c4), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))), wcel(c4, universe))
  suppimacnv(c0, c1, c4, universe)

blocks.name: deg1lt
blocks.content: If the degree of a univariate polynomial is less than some index, then that coefficient must be zero. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm deg1lt(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdg1, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cpl1, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cco1, c0))
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), c5), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2))
  rspcdva(hs0, c2, cn0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2)), wi(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), c5)), wi(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), c5)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), c5), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c2), c5))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c3, c0), clt)
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), c2, c4, c5)
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2)), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), c5))), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), cle, cfv(c3, c0)))
  xrleidd(cfv(c3, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2)), wb(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), cle, cfv(c3, c0)), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), c5)))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cxr))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c3, c0), clt, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cxr))
  deg1xrcl(c0, c1, c3, c6, c7)
  deg1leb(hs0, c0, c1, cfv(c3, c0), c3, c4, c5, c6, c7)

blocks.name: deg1ge

thm deg1ge(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cdg1, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cpl1, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cco1, c0))

  3impia(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wne(cfv(c3, c2), c4), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c5, c0)))
  necon1ad(cfv(c3, c2), c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c5, c0)))
  sylbird(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c5, c0))), wceq(cfv(c3, c2), c4), wbr(cfv(c5, c0), clt, c2))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wb(wbr(cfv(c5, c0), clt, c2), wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c5, c0)))), wcel(cfv(c5, c0), cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  deg1xrcl(c0, c1, c5, c6, c7)
  rexrd(c2, wcel(c2, cn0))
  nn0re(c2)
  xrltnle(cfv(c5, c0), c2)
  3expia(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c5, c0), clt, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, c2), c4))
  deg1lt(c0, c1, c2, c5, c3, c4, c6, c7)

blocks.name: deg1vscale
blocks.content: The degree of a scalar times a polynomial is at most the degree of the original polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm deg1vscale(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), cle, cfv(c0, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cdg1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crg))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvsca, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
} = {
  mdegvscale(c0, c1, c2, c3, co(c1o, cmpl, c5), c1o, c5, con0, c6, c7, w0)
  deg1fval(c0, c5)

  1on()

  eqid(cfv(cps1, c5))
  ply1vsca(c2, co(c1o, cmpl, c5), c4, c5)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c5))
}

blocks.name: ply1nzb
blocks.content: Univariate polynomials are nonzero iff the base is nonzero. Or in contraposition, the univariate polynomials over the zero ring are also zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: ply1domn
blocks.content: Corollary of ~ deg1mul2 : the univariate polynomials over a domain are a domain. This is true for multivariate but with a much more complicated proof. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)

  domnnzr(c0)

  syl5bir((c0 ‚àà Domn ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1))), ¬¨(hs0 =(0 ` c1)‚à® hs1 =(0 ` c1)), (hs0[(√ó ` c1)]hs1)‚â†(0 ` c1), (hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c1)‚àß hs1 ‚â†(0 ` c1)))
  neanior(hs0, (0 ` c1), hs1, (0 ` c1))

  mpbird(((c0 ‚àà Domn ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1)))‚àß(hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c1)‚àß hs1 ‚â†(0 ` c1))), (hs0[(√ó ` c1)]hs1)‚â†(0 ` c1), ((deg1 ` c0)`(hs0[(√ó ` c1)]hs1))‚àà ‚Ñï0)

  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà Domn ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1)))‚àß(hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c1)‚àß hs1 ‚â†(0 ` c1))), ((coe1 ` hs0)`((deg1 ` c0)` hs0))‚àà(RLReg ` c0), c0 ‚àà Domn, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1), hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c1))

  eqid((RLReg ` c0))
  eqid((coe1 ` hs0))

blocks.name: ply1idom
blocks.content: The ring of univariate polynomials over an integral domain is itself an integral domain. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
